name: Candy Burn
description:
Do you love playing games?
You want a game that you can play offline, and with one hand?
Try this game of ours, as we take you to the survival of a special agent in the post candy apocalypse world.

Your task is very simple, survive the invasion of the candy horde.

As of Now, We Would Like To Test Few Simple Things,

1. The movement mechanics of the game

2. The shooting mechanics of the game

What do you think? Do give us a feedback :)
